title: Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | SB 1.9.31 | 29-04-2022
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: Om Agyanati Miran Dasya Gyananjani Shalakaya Chakshurunmeenitam Jena Tasmai Shri Gurave Namaha
Nama Om Vishnupadaya Krishna Preshtaya Bhutale Shri Mate Bhaktivedanta Swamin Nithinamine
Namaste Saraswate Deve Gauravani Pracharine Nirvishesha Shunyavadi Pashchatya Deshatarine
Jaya Shri Krishna Chaitanya Prabhu Nithyananda Shri Advaita Gadadhara Shiva Sadi Gauravata Vrinda
Hare Krishna Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare
Om Namo Bhagavate Vasudevaya Narayanam Namaskritya Naram Chai Vanarottamam
Devim Saraswati Vyasam Tato Jayam Udi Rayet
In this session we will be discussing
from the 31st verse of the 9th chapter of the 1st canto of Srimad Bhagavatam
Vishuddhaya Dharanayahata Ashubhaha
Tad Eekshayai Vashu Gata Yudhashramaha
Nivritta Sarvendriya Vritti Vibhramaha
Tustava Janyam Visrujanjana
Yudhasharanam
The meaning of this verse is
By pure meditation looking at Lord Sri Krishna
He at once was freed from all material inauspiciousness
and was relieved of all bodily pains caused by the arrow wounds
Thus all the external activities of his senses at once stopped
and he prayed transcendentally to the controller of all living beings
while quitting his material body so Bhishma is simultaneously a expert ashtanga
yogi and also perfect bhakti yogi he is simultaneously both he is teaching by
his example how a astanga yogi should prepare himself for quitting the body he
is also teaching the devotees how a devotee should prepare himself to
quit his body both he is teaching Bhishma's teaching both he is of course
the mahajana the expert the topmost authority among the topmost authorities
12 authorities in practicing dharma
and aiming to attain the highest perfection of practice of dharma which is to go back to god
at the end of this life in the human form of body so here it is described by pure meditation
this is the practice of the ashtanga yoga pure meditation upon whom upon the supreme lord in the
heart now krishna says i am seated in everybody's heart so it is krishna only who's seated in
everyone's heart therefore bhishma deva by pure meditation looking at lord shri krishna of course
for bhishma there is no need to focus his attention on the inside of the heart no need
because krishna was right in front of him the same krishna was seated on the heart was right
in front of bhishma deva so bhishma deva simply had to fix his
more
mind upon the form of lord krishna standing in front of him and by doing so bhishma was
at once freed from all material inauspiciousness
this material body is full of inauspiciousness in so many ways what is this body made up
of flesh and blood and bone and stool and mucus and urine and all kinds of obnoxious
things so this body which we adore so much just
because of some facility for sense enjoyment we give a lot of value to
the body and we are forgetting that this body after all is something material and
not made up of very nice substances it is now simply packaged with a covering called
the skin it's in another place in the bhagavatam described it's a leather bag a skin bag made up
of three elements called vata pitta and kapha vata pitta and kapha air vata is air and pitta
is bile secretion and kapha is mucus obnoxious things mucus and stool and urine and bone and
flesh and blood all horrible things and we adore this body so much in ignorance this ignorance
actually you should understand from the scriptures that this body is not at all auspicious
you should understand from the scriptures that this body is not at all auspicious
it is full of inauspiciousness so bhishma deva by fixing his attention on krishna the
transcendental form of krishna in front of him completely being absorbed in meditation on krishna
he was freed at once from all material inauspiciousness his conscience became
completely spiritualized krishna consciousness he became situated and complete krishna consciousness
and was relieved of all bodily pains caused by arrow wounds all bodily pains completely gone
because the consciousness is differently absorbed thus all of the external activities of his senses
at one stop so proper explains is what is this external activities of the senses so proper says
in the purport the material body is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed
destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed and the consciousness is completely destroyed
so this material energy is actually illusory energy and this body is due to the
illusory energy effect upon the soul the spirit soul so each one of us we are not the body we
are spirit soul we are completely spiritual by nature but when there is the influence of the
illusory energy we become bewildered we forget ourself and we identify with the material body
which is the covering for our real self further sri lakshmi says identification with the material
body is due to forgetfulness of our eternal relationship with the lord all of us each one
of us we have a eternal relationship
with krishna because we belong to krishna we have a relationship
with krishna in the spiritual world we have a relationship with krishna in the spiritual world
but we forget that when we are situated in the material body by the influence of the
illusory energy we forget krishna we forget our relationship with krishna and we identify with
this body as myself if you ask me
are you I describe myself in terms of my body and mind body and mind which is not
the real self which is not me which is my covering there is a subtle covering
called the mind and a gross covering called the material body the external
gross body for a pure devotee of the Lord like Bhishma Deva this illusion was
at once removed as soon as the Lord arrived as soon as Krishna came in front
of Bhishma Deva by just fixing his attention on Krishna who is the most
attractive personality most attractive beautiful form in the whole creation
that supremely attractive Krishna came in front of Bhishma Deva Bhishma Deva at
once fixed his attention on Krishna and all his illusion was gone
you
of course as pure devotee was never an illusion but even if there was any
material pain or material inauspiciousness that is all completely
that is that disappeared when Krishna arrived in front of Bhishma Deva so how
does it work Prabhupada explains by giving example from the Chaitanya
Charita Amrita Lord Krishna is like the Sun Krishna's Surya Sama and the
illusory external material energy is like darkness Maya Hoy Andhakar Maya
material energy illusory energy is like darkness Krishna the Supreme
Personality of Godhead is like the Sun in the presence of the Sun there is no
possibility that darkness can stand just like in the morning when the Sun rises
there is no darkness that remains which was there at the night when the Sun was
not in the sky similarly just on the arrival of lord krishna all material contamination is
completely removed and bhismadeva was thus able to be transcendentally situated by stopping the
activities of the impure senses in collaboration with matter this requires little explanation
now when we are not krishna conscious then our consciousness is limited to our body and the mind
in such a state of consciousness we are
acting we are performing activities uh with our senses with the body
uh in collaboration with matter that means the original senses which are our
spiritual senses they are the ones we are utilizing
for performing material activities
through the covering called the body the material senses like the hands the legs
the eyes the ears we are seeing through the eyes we are hearing through the ears we are
utilizing our hands for different activities
or the legs for walking or for any any other purpose material purposes so all this is impure
because it is material it's impure the soul is originally pure and also the senses original
senses are pure senses spiritual senses by material contamination the senses assume
the role of imperfection and impurity so when we are covered by the material body
we identify with the body and we wrongly think that my this material hand is my real hand
or the material eyes this whole arrangement
called the material eye i think that is my eyes
i am completely forgetful of my spiritual eye which is different from this material life
my spiritual hand different from my material hand
all my spiritual senses are different from my material senses the material senses are covering
the spiritual senses so when
we revive our contact with the supreme lord krishna through devotional service or through yoga
practice the senses again become freed from material contamination then our original senses
spiritual senses are awakened and we act with our spiritual senses we act spiritually
through with spiritual senses we act perform spiritual activities the same activities
and through the material senses we perform material activities the same activities
so spiritual life means awakening our spiritual senses by contact with krishna
this contact with krishna is very easy through chanting and hearing the holy name of krishna
chanting and hearing the holy name of Krishna Hare Krishna when I say Hare
Krishna Krishna appears in the form of transcendental sound on my tongue and
Krishna appears in the form of sound so I hear that sound and thereby I contact
the transcendental personality Krishna in the form of this transcendental sound
so then immediately I am freed from this material a misconception material
covering I'm free in the level of the consciousness then I can perform
spiritual activities in spiritual consciousness so this is the whole
process of bhakti yoga this has to be practiced just like I say Hare Krishna I
am freed from the material misconception but again after saying Hare Krishna when
I stop saying Hare Krishna again I go back to my original consciousness
material consciousness
so by practice we learn to come out of this material consciousness and when we
are completely out of the material consciousness by always being in Krishna
consciousness then no more this material covering will be effective will be
situated in our spiritual position in spiritual consciousness we'll discuss
more in the next verse thank you very much Hare Krishna
